name: Goldfish Aquarium - Japanese Style
description:
This is the best goldfish app.
- You can choose one of six kind of goldfishes.
- You can know growth of goldfish in real time. This feature is available on this app only.
- Cool and beautiful japanese style aquarium.
- Simple and easy.

Care is very easy. You should feed goldfish once every three days, and change the water only once a week.
Goldfish is very small at first, but it will grow bigger little by little every day.
Enjoy the growth of goldfish in your daily life!
